Hayes’ beautiful live rendition of Rhapsody in Blue is without question the highlight of “Good Night, Oscar,”…   Unfortunately, there were few other highlights for me in this workmanlike production that attempts a portrait of Oscar Levant.… How do you dramatize the complex life of such a complicated man? “Good Night, Oscar” does so primarily by relying on 65-year-old one-liners and a bit of psychodrama during a single TV talk show appearance.
